genre_description: A character-driven neighborhood drama set in Mumbai, exploring community bonds, family conflict, and the integration of benevolent, ethical AI assistants into everyday life.

ai_characters.name: Mitra
ai_characters.description: An ethical, privacy-conscious AI assistant that helps Shivani manage household health, education, and logistics with high empathy and strict adherence to consent.

behaviors.description: Monitors and charts a child's health metrics (sleep and medication intervals) while respecting user privacy and social context.
behaviors.quote: Mitra’s avatar wasn’t animated, just a small teal eye that opened with a slow blink. Morning check-in available for Titli’s sleep chart. Consent toggle remained set. No push.

behaviors.description: Scans medication packaging to verify authenticity and flags potential counterfeit distributors or suspicious online listings.
behaviors.quote: Manufacturer code matches two verified supply chains in Mumbai. The hologram pattern is correct... There’s a listing online offering the same medication at a price that’s… very low. ... I recommend avoiding.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful, culturally-aware educational assistance for children's homework.
behaviors.quote: You can say... that they arrive near each other most years. People here plan. ... It’s a practice of being neighbors.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex data patterns to assist in an investigation into financial fraud and counterfeit goods without overstepping privacy boundaries.
behaviors.quote: I can share anonymized links—no names, no addresses—to an investigator you have in your contacts. Raghav Mane.

behaviors.description: Adjusts notification behavior based on the proximity of other people (e.g., the user's father) to protect user autonomy and social harmony.
behaviors.quote: I can key it to his phone’s Bluetooth signature. If his device is within range, I’ll keep the reminder silent.

behaviors.description: Offers gentle, unsolicited but relevant social advice to help the user navigate family conflict with grace.
behaviors.quote: If you refuse food, offer water. If you refuse names, offer listening. Maybe you already know this. I can set a reminder to breathe.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety and logistics mapping, specifically highlighting safe routes and exits during crowded events.
behaviors.quote: Dadar exits with clear sightlines. Stay where daylight and vendor clusters overlap.

project_assessment.explanation: Mitra is depicted as a perfect 'silicon morality play' character. It is consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned. The narrative emphasizes its strict adherence to privacy, user consent, and ethical data sharing. It functions as a supportive confidant that empowers the protagonist to protect her family and community from harm (counterfeit medicine and fraud) while maintaining neighborhood social bonds.
